2. Scopus h Index

According to the scopus h index, IIT Indore ranks first in the research quality among the new IIT's.

Continue Reading »

3. Industry Academia Conclave

The objective of the Conclave is to bring together experts from the industry and R&D organisations to communally discuss some prime issues concerning the relationship between industry and academia based on current societal requirement. The major attributes of the conclave enthral technical talks by keynote speakers exploring avenues of possible fusion pertaining to research & consultancy.

Continue Reading »

4. 2nd Convocation

The Institute is organized its Second Convocation Ceremony on 5th June 2014, in which 119 B.Tech. students and 4 Ph.D. students would be awarded their degrees.Bharat Ratna Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam, Former President of India, will be the Chief Guest.

Continue Reading »
